name: Can You Top This? Quiz | Mixed  5 Questions | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is not one of the top four deli sandwiches?
questions.explanation:
Pastrami.

	Pastrami came in number five.

questions.text: What was the top karaoke song in 1993?
questions.explanation:
New York, New York.

	'My Way' was number two which gave Frank Sinatra songs top billing.

questions.text: Who had the largest armed forces of World War One?
questions.explanation:
Russia.

	Germany, the British Empire and France were 2, 3 and 4 in that order. The United States was seventh.

questions.text: What was the longest running show on Broadway as of 1998?
questions.explanation:
A Chorus Line.

	'Oh Calcutta' was second, 'Cats' third and 'Grease' was fifth.

questions.text: What is the longest bone in the human body?
questions.explanation:
Femur.

	The femur is the thighbone with an average length of 19.88 inches. The tibia, which came in second has an average length of 16.94 inches.
